actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Referred to Subcommittee on Legislative Process.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to restrict the consideration of supplemental appropriation bills by the Committee on Appropriations.

summary.text: Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that any request to the Committee on Appropriations for supplemental appropriations be accompanied by a statement showing: (1) the amount of supplemental appropriation being requested; (2) the urgent circumstances giving rise to the need for additional funds; and (3) the reasons why the request may not be postponed until the next regular appropriation bill.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to restrict the consideration of supplemental appropriation bills by the Committee on Appropriations.
